Package eg.projects

Interface Configurable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ProjectCommands
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProject, GenericProject, HtmlProject, JavaProject, PerlProject, PythonProject, RProject
public interface Configurable
The interface that defines the configuration of a project.

The configuration depends on a class that defines a window where the settings for a project are entered.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void buildSettingsWindow()
    Builds a settings window depending on the input options required in a project
    boolean configure​(java.lang.String dir)
    Configures a project based on the entries in the settings window
    java.lang.String executableDirName()
    Returns the last name of the directory where executable files are saved.
    boolean isInProject​(java.lang.String dir)
    Returns if the specified directory is or is contained in the project root directory
    void openSettingsWindow()
    Opens the settings window
    java.lang.String projectName()
    Returns the last name of the project directory
    java.lang.String projectPath()
    Returns the path of the project directory
    ProjectTypes projectType()
    Returns the type of the project
    boolean retrieve​(java.lang.String dir)
    Tries to retrieve a project stored in a preferences file
    void setConfiguringAction​(java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
    Sets the ActionListener that is called when the entries in the settings window are confirmed.
    void storeConfiguration()
    Stores the configuration in a preferences file
    boolean usesProjectFile()
    Returns if the project uses a main file that is executed when the project is run

  • Method Details

    • buildSettingsWindow

      void buildSettingsWindow()
      Builds a settings window depending on the input options required in a project

    • openSettingsWindow

      void openSettingsWindow()
      Opens the settings window

    • setConfiguringAction

      void setConfiguringAction​(java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
      Sets the ActionListener that is called when the entries in the settings window are confirmed. The listener calls configure(java.lang.String) and assigns/updates the project if the configuration is successful
      Parameters:
      al - the ActionListener

    • configure

      boolean configure​(java.lang.String dir)
      Configures a project based on the entries in the settings window
      Parameters:
      dir - the directory that may be or be contained in the project directory named in the settings window
      Returns:
      true if the project could be configured

    • retrieve

      boolean retrieve​(java.lang.String dir)
      Tries to retrieve a project stored in a preferences file
      Parameters:
      dir - the directory that may be or be contained in a stored project
      Returns:
      true if a stored project could be retrieved

    • projectType

      ProjectTypes projectType()
      Returns the type of the project
      Returns:
      the type of project

    • usesProjectFile

      boolean usesProjectFile()
      Returns if the project uses a main file that is executed when the project is run
      Returns:
      true if a main file is used, false otherwise

    • isInProject

      boolean isInProject​(java.lang.String dir)
      Returns if the specified directory is or is contained in the project root directory
      Parameters:
      dir - the directory
      Returns:
      true if the directory is in the project, false otherwise

    • projectPath

      java.lang.String projectPath()
      Returns the path of the project directory
      Returns:
      the directory

    • projectName

      java.lang.String projectName()
      Returns the last name of the project directory
      Returns:
      the name

    • executableDirName

      java.lang.String executableDirName()
      Returns the last name of the directory where executable files are saved. This directory, if given, is deletable in the project explorer.
      Returns:
      the name, the empty string if no such directory is given

    • storeConfiguration

      void storeConfiguration()
      Stores the configuration in a preferences file
